remarks: Transitivity law for outsideness.  Theorem 6.7 of [Schwabhauser] p. 44. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 18-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement: outsideoftr $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. ( EE ` N ) /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) ) /\ ( C e. ( EE ` N ) /\ P e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) -> ( ( P OutsideOf <. A , B >. /\ P OutsideOf <. B , C >. ) -> P OutsideOf <. A , C >. ) ) $.
